successes.title: Jane Jensen's Moebius and Pinkerton Road Studio
successes.description: Moebius -- A new adventure game from the creator of Gabriel Knight and Gray Matter.

Pledges.description:
"CSG SUPPORTER":
One of our studio releases this CSG cycle (your choice) on PC download.  Access to quarterly Pinkerton Road CSG studio updates and our CSG-only forum.

"CSG SUPPORTER II":
Digital download of our "best of the year" game music soundtrack, monthly CSG wallpaper showcasing our latest art, participation in our "A/B" test group (give input on our games) -- and all previous tiers' reward goodies.

"CSG MEMBER": ALL of our studio releases this CSG cycle on PC download, access to monthly Pinkerton Road studio updates, Beta test invite, pdf of Jane's design bibles for this cycle, digitally signed -- and all prevoius tiers' reward godies.
THIS HAS BEEN ADDED TO THE $50 TIER -- the GK1 and GK2 novels as e-book.  (applies to all tiers above, too).

"SILVER NON-PHYSICAL" -- This tier gets all of the digital items that the $100 tier gets (including the pdf of the Creative Review book and digital art print) but none of the physical goods.  Good 'mid ground' for people who don't want items shipped to them.

"CSG SILVER MEMBER":  Limited edition CSG member annual T-shirt, Music CD "Best of the year" game music, Packaged DVD versions of all our studio releases for this CSG cycle, pdf of our Pinkerton Road 2012 Creative Review book.  All previous reward tiers' goodies.  U.S. shipping included.  If international please add $10.
This has BEEN ADDED to the $100 tier -- 1 high-res digital art print from this year's art, signed by the artist, Jane and Robert.  8.5"x11".  Suitable for printing and framing.

We have added the big box edition of Moebius to the $100 tier.  Since we can't edit the tiers, I'm putting this info here but note that you only need to sign up for the $100 level to receive this . Please add $10 for shipping outside the U.S.

Everything at the $100 level PLUS you will get BOTH of our CSG T-shirts (Moebius and Farm CSG).  Note that the levels above this will still only get ONE T-shirt.  Remember to add $10 to your total for shipping outside the U.S.

An old school "big box" DVD version of this season's games, pdf of the GK1 design bible, digitally signed by Jane, ftp access to all our digital soundtrack music for the year in WAV, AIFF and mp3 format. All previous reward tiers' incredible goodies!

Everything at the $200 level PLUS you will get BOTH of our CSG T-shirts (Moebius and Farm CSG).  Note that the levels above this will still only get ONE T-shirt.  Remember to add $10 to your total for shipping outside the U.S.
By popular request -- this tier gets all the physical goodies of the $200 tier PLUS all 3 GK design bibles.

"DIGITAL DELUXE" tier.  This tier is for those who want *no hard goods* shipped to them. It does not include any "hard goods" in previous tiers but does include all digital items in previous tiers.  PLUS:  our games delivered digitally with a pdf of the "big box" cover and inside goodies, all THREE GK design bibles as pdfs.  3 high-res digital art prints, 8.5x11", signed by the artist, Jane and Robert, suitable or printing and framing.

Everything at the $224 level PLUS you will get BOTH of our CSG T-shirts (Moebius and Farm CSG). Note that the levels above this will still only get ONE T-shirt. Remember to add $10 to your total for shipping outside the U.S.

"CSG GOLD MEMBER":  Invitiation to annual open house & Scarlet  Furies concert at the Pinkerton Road studio/farm for you and 1 guest.  Scarlet Furies CD.  1 Game poster from our biggest release.  Thanks in the game credits for all games shipped this CSG cycle.  All previous reward tiers' incredible goodies!  U.S. shipping included. If international please add $10.

Everything at the $250 level PLUS you will get BOTH of our CSG T-shirts (Moebius and Farm CSG).  Note that the levels above this will still only get ONE T-shirt.  Remember to add $10 to your total for shipping outside the U.S.
All tier goodies before this one (with a "Big Box" version of the game).  PLUS, one original, one of a kind, GK1 pencil sketch signed by Jane, Robert and John Shroades.  See update #9 for details.

Everything at the $500 level PLUS you will get BOTH of our CSG T-shirts (Moebius and Farm CSG).  Note that the levels $1000 + will get 2 T-shirts if they want both.  Remember to add $10 to your total for shipping outside the U.S.

"STUDIO MEMBER":  An original piece of art from each of this season's games signed by the artist, Jane and Robert.  A hard copy of our Pinkerton Road 2012 Creative Review book, signed by Jane and Robert.  All previous reward tiers' incredible goodies!

All previous tier goodies PLUS:  Robert Holmes will compose a music piece just for you.  Send him a photo of yourself or your special someone along with a brief description of what you want to convey (I love you, You're having my baby, Bad Ass).  He'll produce a full soundtrack piece which you'll receive as a signed CD plus lossless digital track.  This can be yours exclusively forever OR you can have it appear in one of our games with the title and credit of your choice.
New reward for the $5K and up levels -- the Scarlet Furies will fly anywhere in the U.S. and perform a private concert at your event.  (everything else at the $5K tier still applies as well)

"STUDIO SILVER MEMBER":  A character design of you as a character in Gabriel Knight or one of our other games (your choice) with a full-color print signed by the artist, Jane and Robert.  A hard copy of the GK1 design bible, personalized and signed by Jane and soft bound.    All previous reward tiers' incredible goodies!

"STUDIO GOLD MEMBER":  Lunch with Jane and Robert at the studio in PA or at a game conference they're attending.  A private farm/studio tour (in Lancaster County PA) including a hands-on sneak peek of our gaming morsels in production.  Your character design (from previous tier) will be a character in one of our games (name and likeness).  All previous reward tiers' incredible goodies!
